1200180.name: Fly Fly Tank
1200180.description:
The Tank Game aimed at "Zero Stress"!

"Solving Mysteries" and "Collecting Items"
Recommended only for those who are not interested in.

If it's not fun to play, you can return it!
(Games within 2 weeks of purchase and less than 2 hours of use)



"PvP Mode " was added (Local)
"2-player co-op mode" was added. More chaotic!! (Since Stage 6)



Simple Operation Method:
[Mouse/keyboard operation]
Move: Arrow Key(keyboard) or  "A" left, "D" right, "W" Front, "S" back.
Sighting: Mouse
Shot firing: Mouse Left button(click or it pressed).
[Controller operation]
Move: L stick
Sighting: R stick
Shot firing: R trigger (or L trigger )
→ Operation is only Mouse and Arrow Keys!
took the plunge and reduced The Number of Buttons


"Victory method!"
The Operation is easy, but requires Strategy to Win!
Enemy tanks are blown away by bullets, so
Blow enemies and play like billiards!!
You can efficiently deal damage by hitting one another.
Collect enemies and bang them together!!
At first Single Battle, But the end game are Group Wars at Town and Fortress!!


"It has following features."
① Equipped with full 3D Humanoid Character, which is rare in Tank Games!
② There is Boss Battle in each Area. If defeat, you'll get Weapon of Boss!
③ Realistic Movements of Enemies, Allies, Bullets, and Objects based on Physics.


"Recommended for people like this"
・ It's a tank, but want to hit cannon bang bang without difficult operations.
・ It's a tank, but want to run up the building.
・ It's a tank, but want to fly
・ It's a tank, but want to be a snowman.
・ It's a tank, but want to get in the way of my allies.
・ It's a tank, but want to attack the castle
・ It's a tank, but want to shoot bow and arrow.
・ It's a tank, but want to ride a supercar.
・ It's a tank, but want to jump off the building.
・ It's a tank, but want to throw bombs.
・ It's a tank, but want to swing a spear with a tank.
・ It's a tank, but want to use tanks for medieval warfare.

"Simple has a Reason"
・Simple Operation & Fixed Camera Angle
Only as for the Mouse and the Arrow Key . Camera Angle cannot be controlled.
→ The angle of the camera was intentionally fixed for simple operation.
By eliminating the operation of the camera, So players can focus on movement and attacks
However, the position of the camera is adjusted for each stage,
and the front side can be seen by sliding it depending on the player position.
We reduced button to use by operation daringly.
However, Player climb buildings and the wall and can jump from the Pyramid.
It can blow up friend.
・Simple Graphics
The LowPoly that both character and the topography are rough
→ The Gradation of the LowPoly shines by how to hit light.
We tried many times how to apply beautiful light.
・Simple System
Three phases of Levels only seven kinds of bullets
→ We keep individual characteristic in each seven kinds of bullets.
In addition, it becomes the different characteristic because each bullet is improved to three phases.
We realize the attack pattern of 21 ways of 7 X 3.
Player can attack with movement from various height
Clear Pattern is Infinite!!

  • At first Single Battle, But the end game are Group Wars at Town and Fortress!!
In DESERT, ICE, TOWN, FACTORY, MOUNTAIN, MIDDLE AGES, six kinds of rich World.
  • A Huge BOSS appears, too.
  • You can play "Extra Stages" when You clear last stage. Two Bosses appear at the same time there.
